Extract scaffolds connected by paired-end reads

Extracts scaffolds that are connected by paired-end or mate-pair reads.

mmextract_network(subset, network, original, nconnections, type)

Arguments

subset

The subset dataframe to use for network extraction or a vector of scaffold names.
network

The network of connected scaffold.
original

The original dataframe (default: d).
nconnections

The minumum number of connections needed (default: 2).
type

Extract "direct" or "complete" (all) linked scaffolds (default: direct).

Value

A dataframe with scaffold information.

Examples


data(rocco)

p <- mmplot(data = d, x = "C13.12.03", y = "C14.01.09", log.x = T, log.y = T, color = "phylum", minlength = 3000)
#> Error in mmplot(data = d, x = "C13.12.03", y = "C14.01.09", log.x = T,     log.y = T, color = "phylum", minlength = 3000): unused arguments (data = d, log.x = T, log.y = T, minlength = 3000)
sel <- data.frame(C13.12.03  =  c(4.94, 8.99, 10.8, 7.22, 5.79),
                  C14.01.09  =  c(43.9, 57.4, 35.7, 25.7, 32.6))
mmplot_selection(p, sel)
#> Error in mmplot_selection(p, sel): object 'p' not found

dA <- mmextract(d, sel)
#> Error in unlist(data$scaffolds[xname]): object 'd' not found
mmplot(data = dA, x = "C13.12.03", y = "C14.01.09", log.x = T, log.y = T, color = "phylum", minlength = 3000)
#> Error in mmplot(data = dA, x = "C13.12.03", y = "C14.01.09", log.x = T,     log.y = T, color = "phylum", minlength = 3000): unused arguments (data = dA, log.x = T, log.y = T, minlength = 3000)
mmplot_network(data = dA, network = pe, color = "phylum", nconnections = 10)
#> Error in subset(network, network$scaffold1 %in% data$scaffolds$scaffold &     network$scaffold2 %in% data$scaffolds$scaffold & network$connections >=     nconnections): object 'pe' not found

dB <- mmextract_network(subset = dA, original = d, network = pe, nconnections = 10, type = "direct")
#> Error in mmextract_network(subset = dA, original = d, network = pe, nconnections = 10,     type = "direct"): object 'dA' not found
mmplot(data = dB, x = "C13.12.03", y = "C14.01.09", log.x = T, log.y = T, color = "phylum", minlength = 3000)
#> Error in mmplot(data = dB, x = "C13.12.03", y = "C14.01.09", log.x = T,     log.y = T, color = "phylum", minlength = 3000): unused arguments (data = dB, log.x = T, log.y = T, minlength = 3000)
mmplot_network(data = dB, network = pe, color = "phylum", nconnections = 10)
#> Error in subset(network, network$scaffold1 %in% data$scaffolds$scaffold &     network$scaffold2 %in% data$scaffolds$scaffold & network$connections >=     nconnections): object 'pe' not found
